patthana1.14:1.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— parittārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:1.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:1.1_2: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:2.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—mahaggatārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:2.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatārammaṇaṁ …pe….
patthana1.14:3.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:4.1: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … adhipatipaccayā (saṅkhittaṁ) … avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.14:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.14:7.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ
patthana1.14:7.1_1: parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā. Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.14:7.1_2: parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate
patthana1.14:7.1_3: uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.14:8.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.14:8.1_1: mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate
patthana1.14:8.1_2: uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.14:9.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:10.1: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.14:11.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.14:12.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:13.1: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.14:14.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe
patthana1.14:14.1_1: mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā. (Mahaggatārammaṇe paṭisandhi natthi.)
patthana1.14:15.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe
patthana1.14:15.1_1: appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā. (Napacchājātapaccayañca
patthana1.14:16.1: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—parittārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca parittārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.14:17.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—mahaggatārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.14:18.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—appamāṇārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.14:19.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi
patthana1.14:19.1_1: natthi) … najhānapaccayā—pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā
patthana1.14:19.1_2: …pe… dve khandhā … namaggapaccayā—ahetukaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana1.14:19.1_3: tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… dve khandhā …pe….
patthana1.14:20.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā—ahetukaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:21.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā—ahetukaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:22.1: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.14:23.1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.14:24.1: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā.
patthana1.14:25.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane
patthana1.14:25.1_1: tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.14:27.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.14:29.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe
patthana1.14:29.1_1: tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme tīṇi, vipāke
patthana1.14:29.1_2: ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte
patthana1.14:29.1_3: tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.14:32.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— parittārammaṇā
patthana1.14:32.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇā
patthana1.14:33.1: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— mahaggatārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.14:34.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— appamāṇārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:35.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ
patthana1.14:35.1_1: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati,
patthana1.14:35.1_2: ariyā parittārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.14:35.1_3: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Parittārammaṇe paritte khandhe aniccato dukkhato
patthana1.14:35.1_4: anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati
patthana1.14:35.1_6: cittaṁ jānāti. Parittārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.14:36.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dibbaṁ
patthana1.14:36.1_1: cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ paccavekkhati, parittārammaṇaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ
patthana1.14:36.1_3: …pe… anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati. Parittārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe aniccato …pe…
patthana1.14:36.1_4: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.14:36.1_6: jānāti. Parittārammaṇā mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.14:37.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ
patthana1.14:37.1_3: …pe… anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati. Mahaggatārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe aniccato …pe…
patthana1.14:37.1_4: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.14:37.1_6: jānāti. Mahaggatārammaṇā mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.14:38.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— paṭhamajjhānapaccavekkhaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:38.1_5: ariyā mahaggatārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.14:38.1_6: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Mahaggatārammaṇe paritte khandhe aniccato …pe…
patthana1.14:38.1_7: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ
patthana1.14:38.1_9: Mahaggatārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa,
patthana1.14:39.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ariyā
patthana1.14:39.1_1: maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti. Cetopariyañāṇena
patthana1.14:39.1_2: appamāṇārammaṇaappamāṇacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti. Appamāṇārammaṇā appamāṇā khandhā
patthana1.14:39.1_3: cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:40.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ariyā
patthana1.14:40.1_1: gotrabhuṁ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ paccavekkhanti, maggapaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.14:40.1_3: paritte khandhe aniccato …pe… vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena appamāṇārammaṇaparittacittasamaṅgissa
patthana1.14:40.1_4: cittaṁ jānāti. Appamāṇārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.14:41.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā
patthana1.14:41.1_3: cittaṁ jānanti. Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.14:42.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.14:42.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā
patthana1.14:42.1_2: taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, parittārammaṇe
patthana1.14:42.1_3: paritte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā parittārammaṇo
patthana1.14:42.1_4: rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—parittārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.14:43.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—dibbaṁ
patthana1.14:43.1_1: cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe… parittārammaṇaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ
patthana1.14:43.1_3: garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati. Parittārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti
patthana1.14:43.1_4: abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.14:44.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.14:44.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ
patthana1.14:44.1_3: …pe… yathākammūpagañāṇaṁ …pe… anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati. Mahaggatārammaṇe
patthana1.14:44.1_4: mahaggate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā mahaggatārammaṇo
patthana1.14:44.1_5: rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—mahaggatārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.14:45.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—paṭhamajjhānapaccavekkhaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:45.1_1: garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati …pe… anāgataṁsañāṇapaccavekkhaṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.14:45.1_2: Mahaggatārammaṇe paritte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā
patthana1.14:46.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.14:46.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.14:46.1_2: phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti. Sahajātādhipati—appamāṇārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.14:47.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—sekkhā
patthana1.14:47.1_1: gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, maggapaccavekkhaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:47.1_2: garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalapaccavekkhaṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānapaccavekkhaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:48.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—sekkhā
patthana1.14:48.1_1: appamāṇārammaṇaṁ cetopariyañāṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti. Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ
patthana1.14:49.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.14:49.1_1: purimā parittārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ parittārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.14:50.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— parittārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:50.1_1: cuticittaṁ mahaggatārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Parittārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:50.1_2: bhavaṅgaṁ mahaggatārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Parittārammaṇā
patthana1.14:51.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— parittārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:51.1_1: bhavaṅgaṁ appamāṇārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Parittārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:51.1_2: anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:52.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā
patthana1.14:52.1_1: purimā mahaggatārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ mahaggatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.14:53.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— mahaggatārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:53.1_1: cuticittaṁ parittārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:53.1_2: bhavaṅgaṁ parittārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Mahaggatārammaṇā
patthana1.14:54.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—mahaggatārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:54.1_1: bhavaṅgaṁ appamāṇārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:54.1_2: anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā … nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa
patthana1.14:55.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.14:55.1_1: purimā appamāṇārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ appamāṇārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.14:55.1_2: anantarapaccayena paccayo. Gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa … maggo phalassa
patthana1.14:56.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— maggapaccavekkhaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:56.1_4: … anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ parittārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa … phalaṁ parittārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa
patthana1.14:57.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggapaccavekkhaṇaṁ
patthana1.14:58.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.14:59.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Paṭiccavārasadisā kātabbā.)
patthana1.14:60.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.14:60.1_2: upanissāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ …pe… parittārammaṇaṁ jhānaṁ uppādeti,
patthana1.14:60.1_3: vipassanaṁ …pe… abhiññaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.14:60.1_4: Parittārammaṇaṁ sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ … rāgaṁ dosaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ … diṭṭhiṁ … patthanaṁ
patthana1.14:60.1_5: … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ
patthana1.14:60.1_6: …pe… parittārammaṇaṁ jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ …pe… abhiññaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti,
patthana1.14:60.1_7: pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Parittārammaṇā saddhā …pe… paññā, rāgo …pe… patthanā,
patthana1.14:60.1_8: kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … parittārammaṇāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya rāgassa
patthana1.14:60.1_9: …pe… patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.14:61.1_7: saddhāya …pe… paññāya rāgassa …pe… patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.14:69.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana1.14:69.1_1: purimā parittārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ parittārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.14:70.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— parittārammaṇaṁ anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:71.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā
patthana1.14:71.1_1: purimā mahaggatārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ mahaggatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ

patthana1.14:73.1_1: purimā appamāṇārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ appamāṇārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.14:73.1_2: āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:74.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana1.14:74.1_1: nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā—parittārammaṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena
patthana1.14:74.1_2: paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Nānākkhaṇikā—parittārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ parittārammaṇānaṁ

patthana1.14:75.1_2: paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Nānākkhaṇikā—mahaggatārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ mahaggatārammaṇānaṁ

patthana1.14:77.1_2: paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—appamāṇārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ appamāṇārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.14:78.1: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—appamāṇārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ parittārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:79.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena
patthana1.14:79.1_1: paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.14:79.1_2: … sampayuttapaccayena paccaya … atthipaccayena paccayo … natthipaccayena paccayo
patthana1.14:80.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte
patthana1.14:80.1_1: tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca,
patthana1.14:80.1_2: vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava,
patthana1.14:82.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:83.1: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.14:91.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare
patthana1.14:91.1_1: nava, nasahajāte nava, naaññamaññe nava, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte
patthana1.14:91.1_2: nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava …pe… namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte
patthana1.14:91.1_3: nava, noatthiyā nava, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate nava. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.14:93.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte
patthana1.14:93.1_1: napacchājāte naāsevane tīṇi …pe… namagge navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate tīṇi. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.14:95.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana1.14:95.1_1: sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane pañca, kamme
patthana1.14:95.1_2: pañca, vipāke tīṇi …pe… sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava,
